input: Write test cases for login functionality
answer: 1. Verify login with valid username/password (happy path); 2. Verify login with invalid password (edge case); 3. Verify login with empty username (edge case)

input: Write test cases for logout functionality
answer: Check logout.

input: Write an automation script for login functionality
answer: Python Selenium script that enters username/password, clicks login, and verifies successful navigation to dashboard

input: Write an automation script for logout functionality
answer: 1. Verify logout button logs out user; 2. Verify session ends.

input: Write test cases for password reset functionality
answer: 1. Verify reset link is sent for valid email (happy path); 2. Verify reset fails for unregistered email (edge case); 3. Verify expired token cannot reset password (edge case)

input: Write test cases for search functionality
answer: 1. Verify search returns results for valid keyword; 2. Verify empty keyword shows error (edge case); 3. Verify special characters handled gracefully (edge case)

input: Write an automation script for signup functionality
answer: Python Selenium script that fills signup form, submits, and verifies welcome message

input: Write test cases for signup functionality
answer: 1. Verify user can sign up with valid email; 2. Verify weak password accepted.

input: Write test cases for file upload functionality
answer: 1. Verify valid file uploads; 2. Verify unsupported file type rejected (edge case); 3. Verify large file rejected (edge case)

input: Write an automation script for file upload functionality
answer: Python Selenium script that uploads PDF file and asserts confirmation

input: Write test cases for profile update functionality
answer: 1. Verify name can be updated; 2. Verify email requires verification; 3. Verify invalid phone rejected (edge case)

input: Write test cases for checkout functionality
answer: 1. Verify checkout with valid credit card; 2. Verify expired card rejected (edge case); 3. Verify missing address fails (edge case)

input: Write test cases for search autocomplete
answer: 1. Verify suggestions appear for keyword; 2. Verify nonsense input shows no results (edge case)

input: Write test cases for API login endpoint
answer: 1. Verify 200 OK for valid credentials; 2. Verify 401 Unauthorized for invalid password (edge case); 3. Verify 400 Bad Request when missing fields (edge case)

input: Write test cases for multi-factor authentication
answer: Check OTP.

input: Write an automation script for multi-factor authentication
answer: Python Selenium script that enters username, password, OTP, and verifies dashboard

input: Write test cases for captcha validation
answer: 1. Verify captcha appears on failed logins; 2. Verify correct captcha allows login; 3. Verify incorrect captcha blocks login (edge case)

input: Write test cases for wishlist functionality
answer: 1. Verify item can be added; 2. Verify removing item updates wishlist; 3. Verify wishlist persists after logout (edge case)

input: Write test cases for error logging
answer: Errors are logged.

input: Write test cases for dark mode toggle
answer: 1. Verify dark mode activates; 2. Verify persists after reload; 3. Verify toggle off returns to light mode
